Package etomica.cavity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorSchemePaired  
    DataProcessorCavity
    This processor scales up the measured cavity function so that its contact value is equal to the RDF contact value.
    DataProcessorErrorBar  
    DataProcessorGContactP
    DataProcessor that determines g(sigma) from P (measured with the virial)
    DataProcessorPContactG
    DataProcessor that determines g(sigma) from P (measured with the virial)
    HSMDCavity
    Hard sphere simulation that allows one pair of atoms to overlap, which allows the cavity function to be measured.
    HSMDCavity.CavityParam
    Inner class for parameters understood by the HSMDCavity constructor
    HSMDWidom
    Hard sphere simulation that allows one pair of atoms to overlap, which allows the cavity function to be measured.
    HSMDWidom.HSMDParam
    Inner class for parameters understood by the HSMDCavity constructor
    MeterCavity
    Meter collects RDF but is hardcoded to look at only those atoms that are overlapping.
    MeterCavityMapped
    Meter for the cavity function using mapped averaging.
    MeterContactRatio  
    MeterPressureCollisionCount
    Meter for the pressure by counting the number of collisions (assumes HS potential)
    MeterRDFMapped
    Meter for the cavity function using mapped averaging.
    P2HardSphereCavity  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    P2HardSphereCavity.CollisionType
